categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Ubote group was a group of three Rebel-operated Corellian CR90 corvettes during the Galactic Civil War.

In 3 ABY, the corvettes were ordered to destroy Outpost D-34 in orbit around the planet of Javin, which was located within Javin sector. Unfortunately for the Rebels, the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Hammer and Maarek Stele arrived and destroyed all three of the blockade runners before they could destroy the outpost.
